description.en:
GBCR - a finite supply of three-million coins, with only thirty three thousand in circulation and a total of six-million coins to be minted.

GBCR is currently creating collaborative ventures with gold mining companies, whereby the digital asset is underpinned by a stream of gold from the mines production.

GBCR rewards its wallet holders for staking their coins and contributing to our network's decentralisation, mining up to 10% p.a compounded.
